fields.Title of Presentation: <p><span>AI, Technology, and Euskara: A Practical Approach to Subtitling, Translating, and Dubbing</span></p>
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: AI, Technology, and Euskara: A Practical Approach to Subtitling, Translating, and Dubbing
fields.Conference Location: Basque Museum and Cultural Center. Boise , Idaho
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Boise State University and The Basque Museum and Cultural Center
fields.Description/Abstract: September 21st at 6pm for a special presentation by Dr. Igor Leturia and Professor Nere Lete.<br><br>The presentation will include a talk by Igor Leturia on the importance of language and speech technologies for minority languages like Basque, as well as a showcase of the technology used in such research. Then, Professor Nere Lete will explain the process of translating and creating subtitles in Basque, Spanish, and English for a series of ETB documentaries about the Basque diaspora in the United States. She will highlight the advantages and disadvantages that using AI presents when completing such a task.
